# L. Stewart Hinckley

L. Stewart Hinckley (November 23, 1902 â€“ May 8, 1969) served as a member of the California State Assembly from the 73rd district. He was a Republican.  During World War II he served in the United States Army.
Hinckley was born November 23, 1902, in Bryn Mawr, California. He died when the small plane he and his wife were flying near Page, Arizona, crashed on May 8, 1969.
